data.title: Kid Pickford
data.meta_description: We open 30 minutes before the first showtime of the day. All theaters are ADA accessible with wheelchair seating. Closed captioning and assistive listening devices are available at the box office.
data.text:
Kid Pickford

Rich Text

Kid Pickford is a monthly series of matinees carefully chosen for a young audience.

Parents can feel secure bringing their kids to see an array of titles, some beloved, some little known, that will inspire laughs, reflection, conversation and a love of film.

ALL TICKETS $7

Showtimes

Showtimes Between the Temples | 2:55PM, 5:30PM, 8:00PM Made in England: The Films of Powell and Pressburger | 3:10PM Dìdi (弟弟) | 6:00PM Interview with the Vampire | 8:15PM
